intro.text: The purpose of this portfolio website is to quickly become familiar with my few projects and general information about me

about.info: Skilled and passionate full stack web developer with more than 2yrs of experience in building various fun porjects and working on industry projects. Love learning new things and progressing alongside ambitious and adaptable people. Positive reputation for quality work, timely construction, and finishing projects at estimated budget as a freelancer. Being a growth influencer I love to spread the things I learn to others and also learn from amazing people.

education.institution: Manav Rachna International Institute Of Research And Studies

myProjects.name: IWFCLI
myProjects.description: Oclif based backend CLI tool to automate manual setup of micro-services.

myProjects.name: Sorting Visualizer
myProjects.description: Web App built using HTML/CSS/JS to visualize all basic sorting algorithms.

myProjects.name: Indian Campsites
myProjects.description: Website to view and outsource campsights.

myProjects.name: Student Report Management System
myProjects.description: Web App built using HTML/CSS/JS to perform CRUD operations on student records and reports.

collaborations.name: Drop Count
collaborations.description: App to check households water usage efficiency and create awareness to save water.

collaborations.name: ProInit
collaborations.description: Oclif based CLI to automate the long initialization of new development projects.

collaborations.name: Moyyn
collaborations.description: AI based reverse job searching platform.

collaborations.name: Secureverse Landing Page
collaborations.description: Landing page of Secureverse, a web application to check the security of your Crypto  Chain.

openSource.name: GDSC WOW
